name: Feeding The Monster
description: A simple and fun arcade game where your goal is to collect falling objects. The cute monster is very hungry and you must feed it, but beware of bombs, otherwise your adorable furry friend may die!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
